description:
This course introduces teachers and interested adults to K12 blended and online learning. Participants will design a blended or online unit and develop one module to use with K12 students.

                                            Syllabus
                        Trends and Standards in K12 Blended & Online LearningActive Learning & Assessment in K12 Blended & Online LearningTeaching Blended and Online in the Content AreasTechnologies for Blended & Online InstructionDesigning A SyllabusDesigning a Blended or Online Unit PlanDeveloping a ModuleWrapping It Up
title: K-12 Blended & Online Learning
